Name: My name is human
About the game: My name is human - is the simplest visual novel where you will have to make destiny decisions playing as a robot. In this game you must choose who your robot will be-a combat killing machine or a kind robot with human soul, a helpful and caring person. KEY FEATURES: 1) The simplest and understandable gameplay 2) A few different endings 3) Pleasant graphic 4) Your decisions influence on the plot
